ygData.subject: Re: Lore stuff (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Unfortunately, that doesn t qualify as harassment unless you leave and go elsewhere and they follow you. Ask a GM about it sometime, or read the guide
ygData.messageBody:
> No, all you have to claim is that you're trying to attack the
> monsters there, and the bigger guys keep taking it every time.
> In this case, their misguided harassment definition (only
> harassment if it's aimed at an individual) works in your
> favor since they are literally killing everything you attack.

Unfortunately, that doesn't qualify as harassment unless you leave and go
elsewhere and they follow you. Ask a GM about it sometime, or read the
guide handbook. Kill stealing everything at a location isn't harassment.
Following you wherever you go and kill stealing is.

---
Jesse <j@...>
